item.title: Events
item.description: Talks & Presentations Timm Lichte & Laura Kallmeyer. 2021. The (putative) limits of inheritance in constructionist grammar theories. Talk at the Workshop “Constructional approaches in Formal Grammar” of the International Conference on Construction Grammar (ICCG11). 20. August 2021, Antwerpen. Timm Lichte. 2018. Incremental inference-based MWE processing with TUCO. Talk at Cognitive Structures: Linguistic, Philosophical and Psychological Perspectives (CoSt 2018). 12.–14. September 2018, Düsseldorf. Timm Lichte & Christian Wurm. 2018. Meaning and Combinatorics of Ambiguity.
